title: Collaboration becomes civic memory
description: I’ve spent a fair amount of 2025 toggling between my parents’ MyChart accounts. From scheduling appointments to reviewing test results, I — and their doctors — have a one-stop shop for managing their various healthcare needs. A hematologist can request lab work, and a gastroenterologist can review the data before recommending a medication or procedure....
